name: P. O. N. G. (Payment Optimized Net Game)
name_original: P. O. N. G. (Payment Optimized Net Game)
description:
This was a submission for the Create with Code Game jam of summer 2021 

The Theme : Modernizing A Classic

How to Play?

Use 'W' and 'S' or the Up arrow and Down arrow to move your paddle. Try your best to make sure the ball doesn't go in on your side.

How do you win?

With Payment Optimized Net Game, the fun never ends. It's a budding new take on an old game I'm sure you've never heard of before... With modern techniques, it's even better. Constant new features will be added while you play. Think of it as games as a service with some additional content needing more purchase. Fun right?!

Do you feel no shame?

For what? For vastly improving a classic with a new modern spin? Maybe you should feel ashamed for not enjoying all the fun given by Payment Optimized Net Game.

Real talk about assets used

Some sound effects and all music are assets that have been purchased and available for me to use.

Everything else in the game is regrettably my doing.
